list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: play games of chance for money; bet.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was fond of gambling on cards and horses
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy thích đánh bạc trên thẻ và ngựa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: take risky action in the hope of a desired result.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the British could only gamble that something would turn up
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người Anh chỉ có thể đánh bạc rằng một cái gì đó sẽ bật lên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of gambling; an enterprise undertaken or attempted with a risk of loss and a chance of profit or success.
